original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.52. Dvigocchaka, Kusalattika🔽Noupādānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Upādānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  dvigocchaka kusalattika  no upādānam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  upādānam akusalam dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi
